website_summaries.verdict: Great for lipstick removal and eye makeup removal, this Shiseido product removes makeup effortlessly while leaving your skin hydrated.
pros: Dual-phase formula quickly removes waterproof and long-wearing eye makeup and lipstick
Leaves skin feeling clean and moisturized
cons: Some felt it was too oily

customer_reviews.title: Best eye makeup remover I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: My Aunt gave me a sample of this makeup remover & it is by far the best I've ever used. One swish on a cotton ball takes off my waterproof mascara & liquid eye liner. My eyes used to get rubbed pink with other make up removers. I had to rub & rub to get my mascara off. I usually purchase moderately priced toiletries but this to me is worth the splurge. My husband pointed out if I use less of it & it does a better job then I'm not really paying much more for it than a bargain remover I have to use 9 drops of. I will continue to use this remover, I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Skeemer118

customer_reviews.title: Pulls my makeup off without damaging my skin
customer_reviews.text: When you apply makeup to improve your skin, you don't want the act of removing the makeup further damage your skin. This product removes your makeup without effortlessly while leaving your skin hydrated. I use the Shiseido White Lucent face wash, with a Clairsonic brush. And I follow it with this product to take off lipstick and eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Roboto

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, I used different makeup remover, but this is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Teona

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Have tried other eye makeup removers, and like this one. Easy to use, washes off clearly. Tho baby oil works well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is my go to for taking off eye and lip makeup.
customer_reviews.author: KMT1198

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The solution soaks into the cotton ball to allow wiping off all mascara effectively. It has a subtle scent, if any, and the applicator is perfect for getting the right amount. Not too oily or watery, it doesn't leave a residue on the skin, but seems to hydrate and moisturize the skin around the eyes nicely. I haven't used it on my lips yet. I'll definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Portland

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido Ts instant Eye and Lip Makeup Remover Makeup Remover
customer_reviews.text: Shiseido Ts instant Eye and Lip Makeup Remover Makeup Remover, is good one with best price in online works good
customer_reviews.author: indhujayavelu

customer_reviews.title: The best, gentlest makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: I have a very serious eye issue, I trust this product completely to make it possible for me to use it safely.
customer_reviews.author: Ronna M. Casper

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof removal
customer_reviews.text: Works the best out there on the market for waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Fumia

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Gentle for eyes and lips. Recommend highly. Shiseido products are awesome! Sent right away and it was sealed and wrapped well.
customer_reviews.author: c.mcc

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. Doesn't sting the eyes, and not drying to the skin around the eyes. Removes make up well. Has a pleasant faint fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: U. Stebelska

customer_reviews.title: Product looks used
customer_reviews.text: This item came looking opened and used with some old tape on it. This is an eye product and I am afraid to use it because it does not appear new.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Best eye makeup remover ever.
customer_reviews.text: Took me years to finish this bottle but I only use it on my eyes. I've used other liquid removers like Clinique, Neutrogena, and a few other name brand ones. This is by far the most effective and without using much of it even with a full eye make up. Just squirt a bit on a cotton pad and swipe. Flip and swipe again. Can be used for both eyes if your only using liner.
customer_reviews.author: Eve L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality eye makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: Good quality eye makeup remover, but, I discovered that the inexpensive Neutrogena cleansing towelettes not only quickly remove eye makeup AND face makeup, but get the eye makeup off with less rubbing, which is important in order to protect the delicate skin in the eye area. More expensive does not always = better!
customer_reviews.author: AMYL

customer_reviews.title: love shiseido products and this is one of the best ...
customer_reviews.text: love shiseido products and this is one of the best removers for their waterproof/ regular mascara. it also is a great moisturizer on eye lids. very gentle on the delicate area. not much rubbing either to remove same.
customer_reviews.author: bearwolfmoose in Bozeman Montana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  It works.
customer_reviews.text: One or two swipes and you're done. It really is a great product. As all eye makeup removers, avoid your eyes. I got some in my eyes and they felt sort of greasy.
customer_reviews.author: naomi pinto

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed that it is not in stock
customer_reviews.text: This item is very effective and is worth every penny spent. I am very disappointed that it is not in stock.
customer_reviews.author: spence

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: it has no strong smell as other product. my eyes are sensitive so that when i use loreal eyemakeup remover or other relatively cheap remover , my eyes get red and feel painful sometimes. But this product has no damage or hurt or any uncomfortable feelings to my eyes and so fast to clean my eye makeup/
customer_reviews.author: CHEN LIANG

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Best eye makeup remover I've used so far. I mostly use waterproof eye makeup and this + a cotton pad takes it right off.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Not too oily, fast working, and gentle make up remover
customer_reviews.text: My skin does not usually react well with make up removers, but Shisheido's works like magic. This this probably the best make up remover yet.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my skin
customer_reviews.text: It removes all the make up perfectly, but doesn't irritates my skin. My skin a little sensitive to lots of make-up products... but this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yiting Jin

customer_reviews.title: Ok product but there are many alternatives for less
customer_reviews.text: It' s a good product and works as described. I don't really think it's worth it for the price. There are many other products on the market that work as well and cost much less.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: It kind of made my eyes hurt every time I ...
customer_reviews.text: It kind of made my eyes hurt every time I used it to remove the makeup on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it says...it is great for eye makeup removal. I wear hard to get off eye liner and mascara, but have no problem removing it with the Shiseido Ts. It is gentle and does not burn or irritate my eyes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Clare T.

customer_reviews.title: coudn;t be better
customer_reviews.text: It is really the best eye and lip make up remover!I use it for years and will use forever!It lasts a long time,and don;t think is expensive,and worse each penny!
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Great eye make up remover
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Doesn't pull off my eye lashes and works well with waterproof mascara too!
customer_reviews.author: WineGirl70

product_meta.title: Shiseido Ts instant Eye and Lip Makeup Remover Makeup Remover for Unisex, 4.2 Fl. Oz.
product_meta.description: Shiseido THE SKINCARE Instant Eye and Lip Makeup Remover
feature_bullets: Instantly clears waterproof and long-wearing eye and lip makeup
Formulated with Xylitol to keep essential moisture
